CustomField.formula: "Expected turnover: " +TEXT( zz_expected_turnover__c )+ " " + TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) + BR()+ "Lift value: " + TEXT( Lift_forecast_value__c) + " " + TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) + BR()+ BR()+ "Contract adj. at: " +TEXT(zz_Contract_adjustment_at__c)+ BR()+ BR()+ "Transaction volume Protections per year: " + TEXT(zz_Transaction_volume_protections_p__c)+ " " + TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)
CustomField.label: Lift information
